definitions.definition: To match (something or someone which one currently perceives) to a memory of some previous encounter with the same person or thing.
To acknowledge the existence or legality of; to treat as valid or worthy of consideration.
definitions.example: The US and a number of EU countries are expected to recognize Kosovo on Monday.

definitions.definition: (or with clause) To acknowledge or consider (as being a certain thing or having a certain quality or property).
definitions.example: I recognize that my behaviour has been unacceptable.

definitions.definition: To realize or discover the nature of something; apprehend quality in.
To show formal appreciation of, as with an award, commendation etc.
definitions.example: His services were recognized in a testimonial.

definitions.definition: To have the property to bind to specific antigens.
